    Shivam Sawarn

    M.Sc Physics student at University of Delhi. I am interested in Quantum Information Theory and Quantum Computing with experimental interest in Quantum Optics...

    • Delhi, India

    Quantum Open systems and master equation implementation through reinforcement learning

    Date: July 01, 2023

    • Ongoing project in IBM Spring’23 after concluding IBM QAMP Fall’22 along with 5 collaborators

    • Responsible for working out unitary and non-unitary part of Open Quantum Systems Dynamics.

    • Responsible for protection and recovery reward of the agent required for reinforcement learning of the non-unitary part of Schrodinger equation.

    • Work on different noise models including Markovian and non-Markovian noises.

    • Submitted checkpoints on Github for fulfilment of the project.
